Title: Do Stack Traces Help Developers Fix Bugs?
Published: Mining Software Repositories (MSR), 2010 7th IEEE Working Conference on
Elements_risk_assessment:
consider the first frame in the stack as the method that caused the
crash, because the exception occurred in this method
UseOF-SZZ:
information regarding changed locations collected for bug reports found
to contain stack traces were mapped to the methods listed in the respective stack traces
Summary:
seek to provide such evidence by conducting an empirical study on the usage of stack traces
by developers from the ECLIPSE project
Outcome:
the importance of adding stack traces to bug reports and that in the future,
software vendors will provide more support in their products to help general users make such 
information available when filing bug reports.
